Module it.polimi.ingsw.am40
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am40.server.model

Class StartingCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am40.server.model.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.am40.server.model.ResourceCard
it.polimi.ingsw.am40.server.model.StartingCard
public class StartingCard extends ResourceCard
The Starting Card is a child class of Resource Card; it defines the starting cards, which are the initial placeable cards on the grid. They are always at (0,0) coordinates on the private board grid. Unlike the resource cards, the starting ones have also resources on the back edges and in the middle of the front (starting resources)

  • Constructor Details

    • StartingCard

      public StartingCard(int cardID, List<CardElements> startingResources, List<CardElements> frontEdgeResources, List<CardElements> backEdgeResources)
      Constructor method for StartingCard, which creates and initializes the attributes for a new starting card. The parameters which are not taken in input are set on default value. This constructor takes also the score points attribute. This constructor is usually used by the card loader from JSON file
      Parameters:
      cardID - Identification number of the card
      startingResources - List of the starting resources
      frontEdgeResources - List of the front edges element ((1) top-left, (2) top-right, (3) bottom-left, (4) bottom-right)
      backEdgeResources - List of the back edges element ((1) top-left, (2) top-right, (3) bottom-left, (4) bottom-right)

  • Method Details

    • getStartingResources

      public List<CardElements> getStartingResources()
      Getter for starting resources
      Returns:
      the List of the CardElements in the middle of the card

    • getBackEdgeResources

      public List<CardElements> getBackEdgeResources()
      Getter for back edge resources
      Returns:
      the List of the CardElements in the back edges of the card

    • countCardElements

      public Map<CardElements,Integer> countCardElements()
      This method is used during the refreshElementsCounter method in PrivateBoard. It calculates the correct amount of each element based on the orientation of the CardFace
      Overrides:
      countCardElements in class ResourceCard
      Returns:
      a map with the CardElements of the Card as Key and the relative amount as Value

    • activationOnGrid

      public void activationOnGrid(CardFace cardFace)
      This method sets up the card when it's placed in the cardGrid. For a StartingCard, in case it's placed with CardFace == BACK this method resets all the edges to FREE and its face Edges are swapped in order to operate with polymorphism
      Overrides:
      activationOnGrid in class ResourceCard
      Parameters:
      cardFace - is the orientation of the Card placed
